title: England & Germany's Wembley Thriller
description:
The FC crew review England and Germany's thrilling 3-3 draw at Wembley in what was each side's final tune-up ahead of the World Cup and question whether Gareth Southgate was correct to start Harry Maguire and Luke Shaw while leaving Trent Alexander-Arnold out of the 23-man squad. Plus, the panel preview some massive Premier League derbies this weekend between Arsenal-Tottenham and Man City-Man United.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: England and Germany's 3-3 thriller at Wembley; England's confusing squad situation; Massive PL derbies this weekend
